extends java.lang.Object
    class detecting collisions between entities

    • Method Detail

      • getAnyColliding

        public java.util.ArrayList<ColliderPair> getAnyColliding()
        Returns:
        a collider for each unordered pair of (active|passive) or (active/active) entities

      • add

        public void add(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity e)
        adds e to the set of entities to check for collisions with.
        Parameters:
        e - an entity belonging to the colliding family
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if e was already stored

      • remove

        public void remove(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity e)
        removes e from the set of entities to check for collisions if e is stored there. Otherwise nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        e - an entity
